com.d20pro.temp_extraction.plugin.featur.description:
setDescription(text, value)

A helper method to change the short description of a feature during casting.

Inputs are text (a string representing the text component) and a value entry which can be a number or string.

The use of either is optional, as the function joins the two entries as follows:

text + value
com.d20pro.temp_extraction.plugin.featur.name: setDescription
